text: Rafael Valdomiro Greca de Macedo, better known as Rafael Greca (born March 17, 1956) is a Brazilian engineer and politician, current mayor of Curitiba. He was minister of Sport and Tourism (1999–2000), state deputy (2003–06) and federal deputy from Paraná (2000–03).
